pedal.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
pedal.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a part in a car or on a machine that you press with your foot to control it
pedal.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She put her foot down on the accelerator pedal.
pedal.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a part on a piano or organ that you press with your foot to change the quality of the sound
pedal.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Andrew pedalled up the road towards the town centre.
pedal.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to turn or push the pedals on a bicycle or other machine with your feet
